description:
Step into the fast lane with Speed Legacy: Ultimate Drive, where adrenaline, precision, and speed define your every move. Take on a variety of high-octane missions — from intense drag races and precision drifting to daring escapes from relentless pursuers. Every route is a challenge, every second counts, and every turn could be the difference between victory and defeat.
Push your skills to the limit as you race against time, master every maneuver, and prove you have what it takes to become the ultimate driver. Can you handle the thrill, the chaos, and the ultimate rush of the streets?
